product.name: 24" x 36" Exellewis Academic Wall Calendar 2025-2026, July 2025 to June 2026, Laminated Large Dry Erase School Year Calendar for Wall, Horizontal Vertical 12-Month Yearly Planner
product.description:
The academic wall calendar 2025-2026 comes with 4 markers in different colors (black, red, blue and green) allow distinguishing different  tasks. Working with wet or dry erase well, it's convenient for changing  your ideas.
Holidays are marked and highlighted, so you won't miss any important holidays. This dry-erase calendar allows you to track your life or work  at any time. As for notes space, you can jot down something important or  detailed.
This July 2025 to June 2026 wall calendar 24''x36'' comes with 8 pieces of double-sided   adhesive dots, making it easy to apply to any smooth surface. The thicker adhesive dots ensure a firm hold on the wall and prevents it  from sliding down.
product.bullet_points:
• July 2025 to June 2026 -The Exellewis Large Wall Calendar 2025-2026 covers 12 months from July 2025 to June 2026. It is an amazing tool for teachers, students, parents, and school staff to use as a project calendar, helping everyone stay organized throughout the academic school year. No more stress about missing due dates or deadlines!
• Dry & Wet Erasable - The Exellewis July 2025 - June 2026 wall calendar features a waterproof surface that works great with both wet and dry erase markers. You can easily wipe it off when using either type of marker. Whenever you want to change your plans, just wipe it off and write down your new ideas.
• Premium Laminated Paper - Exellewis 24" x 36" academic wall calendars are made of high-quality, double-thick paper with a finishing coat to prevent ink bleed-through and avoid feathering. The stain-resistant surface can be easily wiped clean with a touch of water, leaving no stains or ghosting.
• Large Calendar Blocks - Vertical side blocks measure 1.5" x 1.1" and horizontal side blocks measure 1.34" x 1.22". These provide ample writing space. Major holidays are highlighted, and weekends are marked in a different color, making it ideal for project or event planning, whether you're at school, home, the office, in study groups, or at tutoring centers.
• Rolled-up Packing - Exellewis insists on the highest quality standards for wall calendars. We use a rolled-up packing method to ensure every calendar is kept in its original condition and free from creases.
